sysevent_email_template.message_text: BEGIN:VCALENDAR PRODID:-//Service-now.com//Outlook 11.0 MIMEDIR//EN VERSION:2.0 METHOD:CANCEL BEGIN:VTIMEZONE TZID:Europe/London X-ENTOURAGE-CFTIMEZONE:Europe/London X-ENTOURAGE-TZID:8 BEGIN:STANDARD TZOFFSETFROM:+0100 TZOFFSETTO:+0000 DTSTART:16011001T020000 END:STANDARD BEGIN:DAYLIGHT TZOFFSETFROM:+0000 TZOFFSETTO:+0100 DTSTART:16010301T010000 END:DAYLIGHT END:VTIMEZONE BEGIN:VEVENT SUMMARY:${task.parent.number} - ${task.parent.company.name} DESCRIPTION: DTSTART;TZID=Europe/London:${start_time_ical} DTEND;TZID=Europe/London:${end_time_ical} SEQUENCE:${sys_mod_count} UID:${sys_id} X-SNSYSID:${sys_id} DTSTAMP: ${updated_ical} STATUS:CANCELLED END:VEVENT END:VCALENDAR
sysevent_email_template.name: Deployment Request - Cancel
sysevent_email_template.subject: ${task.parent.number} - ${task.parent.environment} Deployment for ${task.parent.company}
